CommonStyle Class Reference

(Qtitan::CommonStyle)

CommonStyle is an intermediate class between QWindowsStyle and OfficeStyle, it implements some of the supporting mechanisms. More...

    #include <Qtitan>

Inherits QWindowsStyle.

Inherited by Qtitan::OfficeStyle.

  • List of all members, including inherited members

Detailed Description

CommonStyle is an intermediate class between QWindowsStyle and OfficeStyle, it implements some of the supporting mechanisms.

Member Type Documentation

enum CommonStyle::QPrimitiveElement

enum CommonStyle::TypePaint
